title: Drawing, "Etched Mirror Top Dining Room Table", 1933–34
markings: Stamped in black ink in center right: DONALD DESKEY/ASSOCIATES
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions and materials throughout; inscribed in graphite in lower right margin: SCALE 1" - 1' - 0"
description: Drawing for dining room table. Rectangular table top with base made of brushed chromium, rounded legs. Chromium legs rest on thuya burl platform. Surface of table is etched mirror, with center rectangular section etched but not mirror. Chromium band around side of tabletop, and below of thuya burl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Etched Mirror Top Dining Room Table", 1933–34.
1933–34. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1872.
